description: Checks whether the image specified in a process creation event is not a full, absolute path (caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process) Author: Max Altgelt. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Execution Of Not Existing File
query: ((NOT (process.executable:*\\*)) AND (NOT ((NOT _exists_:process.executable) OR (process.executable:("\-" OR "")) OR (process.executable:"Registry" OR process.command_line:"Registry"))))
